item.title: 现在
item.description: What I’m doing now我现在在做什么 焦点 嗯，这就是元答案。在我的生活中，有时候我的头抬起头，环顾四周。还有，当我低头的时候。 现在，我完全低下了头，

item.title: 联络
item.description: Contact lmg_bit@163.com ​ I love hearing from people, so please email me at lmg_bit@163.com and introduce yourself. ​ Why? For two reasons: ​ I love getting to know people around the world. (Many of my best friends and even great loves are people who I met when they emailed to introduce themselves.) ​ Because I know a lot of people, I can help connect you with someone you should meet.

item.title: 菜谱
item.description: 这个页面纪录一些我做菜的菜谱。 S 蒜蓉粉丝扇贝 用料 扇贝肉、龙口粉丝 姜、蒜、小米椒、芹菜杆 油、蚝油、生抽、料酒 做法 1.扇贝肉（如果扇贝肉是冰冻的
